title: The 2014 Golf Awards
headline: The 2014 Golf Awards
description: Hollywood has the Oscars. Music has the Grammys. We proudly present the Year in Golf Awards. Our annual celebration honors the notable (Rory, Michelle, Bubba) and the notorious (Phil, Elkington, Bubba again). And now, the scorecards, please!
body: Hollywood has the Oscars. Music has the Grammys. We proudly present the Year in Golf Awards. Our annual celebration honors the notable (Rory, Michelle, Bubba) and the notorious (Phil, Elkington, Bubba again). And now, the scorecards, please!
